sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>

    <v-app-bar app color="#1F7087">
      <v-app-bar-title class="text-white font-weight-black">管理后台登入</v-app-bar-title>
    </v-app-bar>



    <v-main>
      <v-container fluid fill-height>
        <v-row justify="center" align="center">

            <v-card width="400" class="d-flex justify-center">
              <!--            <v-img-->
              <!--                height="200"-->
              <!--                src="https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2020/07/12/07/47/bee-5396362_1280.jpg"-->
              <!--                cover-->
              <!--                class="text-white"-->
              <!--            >-->
              <!--            </v-img>-->

              <v-card-title class="font-weight-black">用户登入</v-card-title>

              <v-card-text>
                <v-form
                    ref="form"
                    v-model="valid"
                    lazy-validation
                >
                  <v-text-field
                      v-model="username"
                      label="用户名"
                      required
                      class="font-weight-black"
                  ></v-text-field>

                  <v-text-field
                      v-model="password"
                      label="密码"
                      required
                      class="font-weight-black"
                  ></v-text-field>

                  <v-btn
                      color="#1F7087"
                      class="mr-4 font-weight-black text-white"
                      @click="validate"
                  >
                    登入
                  </v-btn>

                </v-form>
              </v-card-text>
            </v-card>

        </v-row>
      </v-container>

    </v-main>

    <v-footer app>

    </v-footer>

  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "adminLogin"
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
